guidesDescription: Get the most out of your dashboard by learning about all its features.
guideLocalisationDescription: The location corresponds to the region chosen when the container was created, and when you chose how to deploy it.
guideObjectsNumberDescription: The number of objects can vary depending on whether or not they are enabled (e.g. versioning, MPU).
guideUsedSpaceDescription: The space used is measured in bytes.
guideEndpointDescription: You need this information to retrieve or change objects via the API.
guideCnameTxtValueDescription: Use the “Static hosting” container on a domain or subdomain. Simply modify the DNS zone by adding a CNAME record with this value.
guideVirtualHostedStyleDescription: Publish your containers and objects on the internet by setting access rights (per object) to give them public access. They are then accessible via the virtual-hosted style address.
guideObjectLockDescription: Lock your resources, for a set time or indefinitely, to protect them from being accidentally deleted or changed.
guideVersioningDescription: Keep your objects’ history to find and restore previous versions.
guideTagsDescription: Tag your objects to organise and manage them more easily.
guideAccessLogsDescription: Check your containers’ access history to track and analyse their activity.
guideStaticWebsiteDescription: Host your static websites directly from your container for fast and secure delivery.
guideAsyncReplicationDescription: An automatic or manual replication rule has or has not been configured on this container.
guideLifecycleDescription: Automatically manage the lifecycle of your objects.
guideDefaultEncryptionDescription: OVHcloud Managed Keys are handled and used on your behalf via OVHcloud’s secure KMS-integrated service.
